meanings.definition: Not used to full capacity or potential.
meanings.sent1: The underused playground equipment sat quietly in the corner.
meanings.sent2: The underused computer was slow and outdated.
meanings.sent3: The underused swing felt lonely without any children playing on it.
meanings.sent4: Her talent was like an underused muscle, waiting to be exercised.
meanings.sent5: The underused gym equipment gathered dust in the basement.

meanings.sent1: The underused meeting room was always empty.
meanings.sent2: The underused pencil was still sharp after months.
meanings.sent3: The underused umbrella never got to fulfill its purpose.
meanings.sent4: His potential was an underused treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The underused road remained quiet and peaceful.
